subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=n|rs=辰00}}

# the [[dragon]] as the fifth sign in the Chinese [[zodiac]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds containing {{lang|ja|辰}}}}
* {{ja-r|辰韓|しんかん}}: the [[w:Jinhan confederacy|Jinhan confederacy]]: a twelve-member [[confederation]], located on the southeast of the Korean peninsula during the [[w:Proto–Three Kingdoms of Korea|proto-Three Kingdoms period]], later absorbed into the growing [[w:Silla|Silla]] kingdom
* {{ja-r|辰刻|しんこく}}: the [[hour]] of the dragon: 7:00 AM to 9:00 AM
* {{ja-r|辰刻法|しんこくほう}}: a [[timekeeping]] method used during the Edo period, using six hours for the day and six for the night
* {{ja-r|辰沙|しんしゃ}}, {{ja-r|辰砂|しんしゃ}}, {{ja-r|辰砂|しんさ}}: [[cinnabar]], [[mercury sulfide]]: a common [[ore]] of [[mercury]]
* {{ja-r|辰砂油|しんしゃゆ}}: cinnabar oil, [[vermilion]] oil: cinnabar mixed with oil, used to treat [[dermatitis]]
* {{ja-r|辰宿|しんしゅく}}: a [[constellation]]
* {{ja-r|辰祭り|たつ まつり}}: "dragon [[festival]]": a [[ceremony]] in Edo-period Japan, held at the houses of the [[wealthy]] in the hour of the dragon on the first day of the dragon after [[New Years]]
* {{ja-r|辰松|^たつまつ}}: the name of a [[family]] of traditional Japanese [[puppeteer]]s
* {{ja-r|辰松風|^たつまつ-ふう}}: a men's [[hairstyle]] popular in the middle of the Edo period, popularized by a noted [[puppeteer]] of the ''Takamatsu'' family
* {{ja-r|辰星|^しんせい}}, {{ja-r|辰星|^たちみぼし}}: alternate name for the planet [[Mercury]]; alternate name for the star [[Antares]]
* {{ja-r|辰年|たつどし}}: the year of the dragon under the Chinese [[zodiac]]
* {{ja-r|辰巳|たつみ}}: between the dragon and the snake: around 9:00 AM on the clock, or [[southeast]] on the [[compass]]
* {{ja-r|辰巳下り|たつみ さがり}}, {{ja-r|辰巳下|たつみ さがり}}: [[gentle]] and [[refined]] of [[speech]] and [[manner]]
* {{ja-r|辰巳上り|たつみ あがり}}, {{ja-r|辰巳上|たつみ あがり}}: [[shrill]] and [[loud]] of [[speech]], [[crude]] and [[course]] of [[manner]]; a [[woman]] from the Fukugawa [[red-light district]] in Edo
* {{ja-r|辰巳言葉|たつみ ことば}}: a [[slang]] or [[argot]] used by the prostitutes and geisha of the Fukugawa [[red-light district]] in Edo
* {{ja-r|辰巳調子|たつみ ちょうし}}: [[shrill]] and [[loud]] of [[speech]], [[crude]] and [[course]] of [[manner]]
* {{ja-r|忌辰|きしん}}: [[deathday]]; anniversary of a person's death
* {{ja-r|時辰|じしん}}: [[time]]
* {{ja-r|星辰|せいしん}}: [[star]]
* {{ja-r|誕辰|たんしん}}: [[birthday]]
* {{ja-r|北辰|ほくしん}}: [[North Star]]; [[polestar]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|たつ}}

# the {{w|Dragon (zodiac)|Dragon}}, the fifth of the twelve {{w|Earthly Branches}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|辰の市|たつ の いち}}: in the [[Yamato]] kingdom of ancient Japan, markets held every day of the dragon
* {{ja-r|辰の一点|たつ の いってん}}: the first 30 [[minute]]s of the [[hour]] of the dragon
* {{ja-r|辰の刻|たつ の こく}}: the [[hour]] of the dragon
* {{ja-r|辰の時|たつ の とき}}: the [[hour]] of the dragon
* {{ja-r|辰に巻いて巳にこぼす|たつ に まいて み に こぼす}}: sunny one day, rainy the next
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Proper noun
